member.name: T:CommonEventHandler.CommonEventHandlerDlgt
member.summary: This delegate describes the signature of the event, which is emited by the generated helper classes.

member.name: M:CommonEventHandler.EventHandlerFactory.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: Name of the Factory. Is used as naming component of the event handlers to create.

member.name: M:CommonEventHandler.EventHandlerFactory.GetEventHandler(System.Reflection.EventInfo)
member.summary: Creates an event handler for the specified event
member.param: The event info class of the event
member.returns: The created event handler help class.

member.name: M:CommonEventHandler.EventHandlerTypeEmitter.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: The name, which the is given to assembly, module and class.

member.name: M:CommonEventHandler.EventHandlerTypeEmitter.GetEventHandlerType(System.Reflection.EventInfo)
member.summary: Emits dynamically a event handler with a given signature, which fills all arguments of the event in an object array and calls a common event.
